messages.subject: Roya's new blog
messages.msgSnippet: I thought it might be interesting to people here to read a blog of a now-grown unschooler. This is my oldest daughter s new blog: Roya is a grown unschooler
messages.messageBody:
I thought it might be interesting to people here to read a blog of a
now-grown unschooler. This is my oldest daughter's new blog:

Roya is a grown unschooler and wife of a park ranger at Griffith Park - an
almost-5,000 acre wild and rugged urban park that borders Hollywood.They
live in a house right on park property. She spends a lot of time hiking in
the park, exploring Hollywood, and crocheting, knitting and working on
other DIY/heritage arts projects. The blog is about all that and whatever
else comes up as she makes her life in the Little House in the Big Park.

http://littlehouseinthebigpark.blogspot.com


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
